name: mptexf
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), universe), wcel(c0, universe))
stmt.pretty: ax-mp((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ 𝕌)

body.origin:
|- wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), universe)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), universe)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), universe))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), universe)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wnfc(s0, c0)

comment: If the domain of a function given by maps-to notation is a set, the function is a set. Inference version of ~ mptexg . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
